mapper.select: select dog_no as dogNo, member_no as memberNo, dog_name as dogName, type_name as dogType, (case type_size when 0 then '소형견' when 1 then '중형견' when 2 then '대형견' END) as dogSize, dog_gender as dogGender, dog_neutral as dogNeutral, dog_vacc as dogVacc, dog_age as dogAge, dog_weight as dogWeight, dog_photo as dogPhoto, dog_mbti as dogMbti from dog_tbl d left join dog_type t on (d.dog_type_no = t.type_code) where member_no = #{_parameter} order by dog_no

select dog_no as dogNo, member_no as memberNo, dog_name as dogName, (type_name || case type_size when 0 then '(소형견)' when 1 then '(중형견)' when 2 then '(대형견)' END) as dogType, dog_gender as dogGender, dog_neutral as dogNeutral, dog_vacc as dogVacc, dog_age as dogAge, dog_weight as dogWeight, dog_photo as dogPhoto, dog_mbti as dogMbti from dog_tbl d left join dog_type t on (d.dog_type_no = t.type_code) where dog_no = #{_parameter}
select type_code as typeCode, type_name as typeName from dog_type where user_input = 0 order by type_code desc
